channel.title: CSP on Nautilus
channel.description: Recent content in CSP on Nautilus

item.title: The Fortress of the DOM: Implementing Trusted Types in Vanilla JavaScript
item.author: libretechsystems@placeq.com (Gray Blowfish)
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) has remained a fixture of the OWASP Top 10 for decades, but as the web has shifted from server-side rendering to complex, client-side logic, the nature of the threat has evolved.
